actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the coverage of domestic service workers provided by the Fair Labor Standards Amendments of 1974.

summary.text: Repeals the coverage of domestic service workers provided under the Fair Labor Standards Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to repeal the coverage of domestic service workers provided by the Fair Labor Standards Amendments of 1974.
